What was discussed in the meeting?





I arrived at the "work" site in the "dead of night". I accessed the site following the correct security and parking proceedures and made my way, using the segragated walkway, to the site office. Before starting work, I took part in a "singsong" which was led by our leader. Special attention was given to the fact that "noona" was on our site and we needed to take extra care because of it. After the meeting, I started my work cycle which included a pre-use check.
